entry.title: IRC meeting agenda, 18:00 UTC Thursday
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a prominent personality in the world of Bitcoin, suggested Thursdays at 18:00 UTC as a suitable time for the core development team to meet and chat on the #bitcoin-dev freenode IRC channel. This timing is equivalent to 6PM Europe/1PM east US/10AM west US. Pieter responded positively to Gavin's suggestion, indicating agreement with the proposed meeting schedule. The #bitcoin-dev freenode IRC channel will provide an opportunity for members of the core development team to collaborate and discuss issues related to Bitcoin.
